items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: through the gates! Length ball on middle, and stayed a bit low. He tried to work this across the line, and the ball crashes into the stumps. It's the offcutter from Fizz, actually, and that's wicket No. 8 for Bangladesh
items.postText: Mashur: "This game's reminding me of the 90s when SL used to play like today's BD & BD used to play like today's SL. BD has come a long way since then & this team has ability to win anything. This Shakib-Tamim-Mushi-Mashrafi-Mahmudullah generation really deserves something precious!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Lakmal, OUT

dismissal.text: RAS Lakmal  b Mustafizur Rahman 20 (25b 1x4 1x6) SR: 80.00

items.preText: Diganta Bahar: "What impressed me toady as BD plyaers and spectetors have shown enough decency as none tried a COBRA dance which might create another spell of hatred. Love cricket"

items.preText: Shashank Kishore: In the event of teams finishing on equal points, the right to progress to Super 4 will be determined as follows: - The team with the most number of wins - If still equal, the team with the highest net run rate - If still equal the team which has won the Head to head game - If still equal by drawing of lots. Super 4 stage: - The team with the most number of wins - If still equal, the team with the highest net run rate - If still equal the team which has won the Head to head game - If still equal by drawing of lots.

items.preText: Avijit: "With Bangladesh winning this, Tamim can run for Prime Minister and Mushfiqur could become President of Bangladesh if a voting is done tonite! Jokes apart, class play by BD today, All Cricket lovers would say alike!"

items.postText: Samrakchan Ghim: "I don't think Nepal deserves a place in Asia Cup just because of their ODI status. Nepal has tremendous work to do, most importantly they need to fix batting owes. Asia Cup is a big tournament to showcase their talent any player so doors should be open for only those teams who deserve. Good to see Hongkong making though qualifiers, it matters most for the dragon nation. "
